Articles.Content:
And this one's a weirdo.

- build an orbital station around Minmus
- space for at least 10 Kerbals
- maintain stability for 10 seconds

So far so good... Now for the clinch:

- **Build the facility into a newly discovered Class C asteroid**
Hey sounds like they added a new condition, that sounds like it should liven up the ordinary station missions...
Well, that's not strictly *impossible,* you just need to capture an asteroid into Minmus orbit and stick a station to it via the Claw.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
yah, but it had a completion time of like a few weeks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> yah, but it had a completion time of like a few weeks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Are you sure it's not the time until you can decide if you accept the mission or not?

> 
> yah, but it had a completion time of like a few weeks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I've never had a contract that would expire in a few weeks(besides ones I had accepted years ago). Are you sure it's not the time it'd expire from your list? Still you could probably do the mission in a hurry. Strap a butt load of fuel with a few lv-ns to get +10km/s dv and make some aggressive burns

Side note: I've never seen that sort of mission, even with mods. What mods are you using
Yes clearly that is the time to accept the mission, pic or it didnt happen
Nothing even remotely impossible about that. Back when the asteroids were new I made a spacecraft that would easily meet those conditions and put it in orbit round Ike.
I thought the "build a space station around an asteroid" missions had been around for a while now?

> 
> I thought the "build a space station around an asteroid" missions had been around for a while now?

It's possible OP only just upgraded their Tracking Station to track unowned objects, which would open up those contracts.

> 
> I thought the "build a space station around an asteroid" missions had been around for a while now?

no, this is "build a station INSIDE an asteroid which is in orbit around Minmus". 

Guess someone heard about the idea of hollowing out asteroids and using them as space habitats...
